KA.AQWE.content: escape by their own cultivation of the mind (eigene Bearbeitung ihres Geistes) > prejudices will come back to haunt those who plant them (i.e. the guardians)
KA.AQWE.linkedContent: escape by their own cultivation of the mind (eigene Bearbeitung ihres Geistes) > prejudices will come back to haunt those who plant them (i.e. the guardians)

KA.IUHCI.content: man’s propensity t enter into society is also linked to a resistance (Widerstande) > man has a desire to associate (vergesellschaften) himself w/ other men and to isolate (vereinzelnen) himself: latter resistance, in society, can come in the form of vainglory and ambition [inclination as Hang or Neigung]
